name: YOMOTSU
description: A transport that sets out at dusk and arrives at midnight. A world above. A world below. YOMOTSU is the thin line that connects the two.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor. Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel GMA series or better. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card.
